assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors of this case report and literature review do not have any conflict of interest to disclose.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: As per our institution’s Research and Ethics Board policy, written informed consent was obtained from all individuals whose personal medical information was included in the case report prior to submission of the manuscript.
